name: Lemon Poppy Dip
description: Sweet and zesty, with a touch of savoury from onion, this lemon poppy dip is the sunshine your snack tray has been waiting for. Dunk, spread, or drizzle it—it's dip time with a lemony twist!
preparation: In a bowl, whisk together yogurt, mayonnaise, dressing mix, and honey, if using.
If you have time, chill 10 min before serving. Serve with your favourite veggies and dippables!
